Package Controller

Class BookingController

java.lang.Object
Controller.BookingController
public class BookingController extends Object
The BookingController class is responsible for adding, retrieving and querying data from the bookings table in the database.

    • addBooking

      public int addBooking(String rentTime, String returnTime, int customerId, int carId)
      Adds Booking with given details to the database
      Parameters:
      rentTime - start time of the rental
      returnTime - return time of the rental
      customerId - id of the customer
      Returns:
      carId id of the car rented

    • removeBooking

      public boolean removeBooking(int id)
      Removes booking from database
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the booking to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if removal was successful else false.
